abstract: The company said it would expand a test of a system that allows advertisers to pay only when an ad spurs a consumer to take an action.
snippet: The company said it would expand a test of a system that allows advertisers to pay only when an ad spurs a consumer to take an action.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, March 20 — Google is experimenting with a new proposition for advertisers: if you don’t get results, you don’t pay.

headline.main: Google Tests an Ad Idea: Pay Only for Results
headline.print_headline: Google Tests an Ad Idea: Pay Only for Results
